name: FPoseDriverTarget
doc: Information about each target in the PoseDriver

TargetScale: Scale applied to this target's function - a larger value will activate this target sooner
DistanceMethod: Override for the distance method to use for each target
FunctionType: Override for the function method to use for each target
bApplyCustomCurve: If we should apply a custom curve mapping to how this target activates
CustomCurve: Custom curve mapping to apply if bApplyCustomCurve is true
DrivenName:
Name of item to drive - depends on DriveOutput setting.
If DriveOutput is DrivePoses, this should be the name of a pose in the assigned PoseAsset
If DriveOutput is DriveCurves, this is the name of the curve (morph target, material param etc) to drive
bIsHidden: If we should hide this pose from the UI
